ServiceState.description: This indicates the state of the Integrated Smart Update Tools Service.

enumDescriptions.Running: SUT service is enabled and is in running state
enumDescriptions.Paused: SUT service is enabled and is in paused state
enumDescriptions.Stopped: SUT service is enabled and is in stopped state

ServiceVersion.description: This indicates the Integrated Smart Update Tools Service Version.

enumDescriptions.AutoDeploy: In this automatic mode, SUT picks up the pending request and components are deployed.
enumDescriptions.AutoDeployReboot: In this automatic mode, SUT picks up the pending request and system is rebooted, if required, after the components are deployed.
enumDescriptions.AutoStage: In this automatic mode, SUT picks up the pending request and components are staged.
enumDescriptions.OnDemand: In this mode, SUT waits for the user to issue ondemand commands to perform stage or deploy operation

Mode.description: This indicates the mode of Integrated Smart Update Tools.

OperationRequestor.description: This indicates the source of the request being processed by Integrated Smart Update Tools

StagingDirectory.description: This indicates the directory were components will be staged.It is a fully qualified path to the directory. Default value for staging directory is %localappdata%/sut/stagingdirectory in windows and /var/tmp/sut/stagingdirectory in linux

PollingIntervalInMinutes.description: This indicates the frequency at which SUT will read the request from RIS tree.

IsSelfUpdate.description: This indicates whether SUT is performing a self update.

SUMPID.description: This indicates the process id of SUM launched during deploy operation.

LastBootUptime.description: This indicates the date and time when the server is booted.

LastOperationTime.description: This indicates the date and time when the last operation performed.

SelfUpdateStatus.description: This indicates the status of SUT self update progress.

enumDescriptions.Pending: Initial value of the state before SUT is self upgraded
enumDescriptions.InProgress: SUT self update is in progress.
enumDescriptions.None: Initial value. SUT self updated is not initiated.

SUTCompName.description: This indicates the name of the SUT component that is getting updated.
